name: Traveler
message: Hey, Im here in name of Lady Liana

name: Traveler
message: I want to know about your problems, it is the time for justice

name: Traveler
message: Lady Liana will make an audience with the king

name: Barkeeper
message: Hmmm... an audience with the king? I don't know if he will be interested in our problems

name: Barkeeper
message: But I can tell you that everything here is going wrong, the king is not listening to us

name: Barkeeper
message: We are just minions for him, he doesn't care about us

name: Barkeeper
message: He is just interested in his own pleasure, he doesn't care about the people, as long as they pay taxes

name: Barkeeper
message: God save us from this king

name: Traveler
message: I will communicate your words to Lady Liana

name: Barkeeper
message: Hope that audience will do some good
